#include<iostream>
//#define comp
#define comp2
using namespace std;
#ifndef comp
int find(int n, int a)
{
    while(n)
    {
            if(a==n%10)
            return 1;
            n/=10;
            }
            return 0;
            }
int main()
{
    int t=0,tt,k,l;
    scanf("%d",&tt);
    while(tt--)
    {
    int n=0;
    t=0;
    scanf("%d %d",&k,&l);
    while(t<k)
    {
                n++;
                if(!find(n,l))
                t++;
                }
           cout<<n<<endl;
           }
     //      system("pause");
           return 0;
           }     
#endif
#ifndef comp2
int main()
{
    int t,n,p;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
           scanf("%d %d",&n,&p);
              
}
#endif
